author: Kirsten Chuba
title: Steven Spielberg Says He Is “Fighting the Tides” to Keep Movies Like ‘Hamnet’ in Theaters So It’s “Not Just Blockbuster” Films on the Big Screen - Yahoo News Canada
description: Spielberg produced Chloé Zhao's new movie, which stars Paul Mescal and Jessie Buckley as William and Agnes Shakespeare.
content:
Chloé Zhao and Jessie Buckley brought their awards season standout Hamnet to Los Angeles on Tuesday night, along with some help from producer Steven Spielberg. 
The film is based on Maggie O’Farrell… [+2841 chars]
